summary: A female only Archmage robe with a knotwork pattern and custom hood.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: Will be reworking the specular maps and cleaning the normal maps soon.

This is the female only version, for the male version goto: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=843

Will make changes as needed. Different variants will be uploaded separately and linked to from all my retexture/reskins.

All versions now include hoods.
To get the hoodless version open the console - player.additem 7C932 1

Male:
Red and blue Archmage variants:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=766
Knotwork:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=843

Please leave feedback on changes or variations you might like to see, and I will get to them should I get the time.

Enjoy

 -Ludovico
author: Ludovico
